name: Jig Saw
description: Also jig saw . an electric machine saw with a narrow blade mounted vertically in a frame, for cutting curves or other difficult lines or patterns.

name: Rotary Tool
description: A rotary tool is a powerful, multipurpose tool with a motorized tip. A rotary cutting tool is typically powered by electricity,

name: Drill Driver
description: A drill driver is a multipurpose tool which can be used for both drilling at high speeds and driving screws into stubborn materials.

name: Marble Cutter
description: Marble cutters are perfect tools for cutting all types of flat stones and marble. These cutters are easy to use and portable.

name: Circular Saw
description: A circular saw is a power-saw using a toothed or abrasive disc or blade to cut different materials using a rotary motion spinning around an arbor.

name: Chop Saw
